meanings.definition: Relating to or involving a flat surface or plane.
meanings.sent1: The architect used planimetric drawings to design the building layout.
meanings.sent2: The planimetric map showed all the roads and buildings in the area.
meanings.sent3: The planimetric view of the landscape made it look like a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her planimetric thinking helped her see the project from a different angle.
meanings.sent5: The planimetric image of the city was clear and easy to understand.

meanings.definition: A map or chart that represents a flat surface without considering elevation.
meanings.sent1: The hiker relied on the planimetric map to navigate through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The planimetric chart displayed the city streets without any hills or valleys.
meanings.sent3: Using the planimetric map, they pretended to be explorers in a flat world.
meanings.sent4: The planimetric representation of the terrain simplified the journey for the travelers.
meanings.sent5: The planimetric map was like a blueprint of the city, showing every detail clearly.
